sense.gloss: acting as agent, acting on (someone's) behalf, executing business for

meanings: counter for decades of ages, eras, etc.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の|↑代行|↑↓だいこう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけよう。
sdata.e: I'll find someone to fill in for you.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑理事↑↓りじ↓↑長↑↓ちょう↓の|↑代行|↑↓だいこう↓をしている。
sdata.e: He is acting for the chief director.
